page.title: 04Country Life - Tiverton Area
page.content: A few of our class live in the countryside in our D Block area. We are not all from farming families but all enjoy living out of the town. Sometimes we wish that we could get into town more easily though as there is little public transport and our families often have to provide lifts. Many of us enjoy pony riding and some even hunt. There are active fox and stag hunts in the area. There is a kennels for fox-hounds at Hensleigh, and the hunt often meets at the Rose and Crown at Calverleigh which is just outside our area to the North West. The Harvest Festival is still an important time in our area and there are many church services held over the harvest weekend as well as games and Harvest Suppers. A very popular organisation in the countryside is the Young Farmers' Club
